snippet: A report by the special inspector general for the Troubled Asset Relief Program said the Hardest Hit Fund has not reached many homeowners in need of aid.
abstract: Report by the special inspector general for the Troubled Asset Relief Program says that the Hardest Hit Fund has not reached many homeowners in need of aid.
lead_paragraph: A report by the special inspector general for the Troubled Asset Relief Program said the Hardest Hit Fund has not reached many homeowners in need of aid.

headline.seo: Treasury Department Faulted in Effort to Relieve Homeowners
